import React, { useState } from 'react' const Charityform = () => { const [donorType, setDonorType] = useState('parent') const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', address: '', donationType: '', studentDetails: '', institutionName: '', institutionType: '', }) const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value }) } return (

{/* Common Fields */}

) : ( <>
)} {/* Donation Type */}

) } export default Charityform
